sources.title: The Hive | FULL MOVIE | 2008 | Horror, SciFi, Action | Killer Ants
sources.description:
A mass of flesh-eating army antsâ€”200 million strongâ€”is making its way through the jungles of Brazil devouring every living thing in its path. Called in to stave off the attack is Horace Lennart, a scientist from Thorax Industries extermination service in Los Angeles, and his girlfriend, entomologist Claire Dubois. But when they discover the bizarre intention and origins of the crawling creatures, they fear for the future of the planet.

Starring Tom Wopat, Kal Weber, Elizabeth Healey, Jessica Reavis, Mark Ramsay, Pisek Intarakanchit, Nicky Tamrong

The Hive FULL MOVIE
2008
Directed by Peter Manus

metadata.Plot: A young man suffering from amnesia must dig deep into the far reaches of his mind to remember who he is and save the love of his life before a virus that has infected him takes over.
metadata.Actors: Gabriel Basso, Sean Gunn, Kathryn Prescott
